conflicts.description: rust: Host GCC version must be at least 7.4
conflicts.name: %gcc@:7.3

conflicts.description: rust: Rust<1.64 not compatible with GCC>=13
conflicts.name: %gcc@13:

dependencies.description:
A cross-platform, open-source build system. CMake is a family of tools
designed to build, test and package software.
dependencies.name: cmake

dependencies.description:
cURL is an open source command line tool and library for transferring
data with URL syntax
dependencies.name: curl

dependencies.description:
libgit2 is a portable, pure C implementation of the Git core methods
provided as a re-entrant linkable library with a solid API, allowing you
to write native speed custom Git applications in any language which
supports C bindings.
dependencies.name: libgit2

dependencies.description: libssh2 is a client-side C library implementing the SSH2 protocol
dependencies.name: libssh2

dependencies.description:
Ninja is a small build system with a focus on speed. It differs from
other build systems in two major respects: it is designed to have its
input files generated by a higher-level build system, and it is designed
to run builds as fast as possible.
dependencies.name: ninja

dependencies.description:
OpenSSL is an open source project that provides a robust, commercial-
grade, and full-featured toolkit for the Transport Layer Security (TLS)
and Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) protocols. It is also a general-purpose
cryptography library.
dependencies.name: openssl

dependencies.description:
pkgconf is a program which helps to configure compiler and linker flags
for development frameworks. It is similar to pkg-config from
freedesktop.org, providing additional functionality while also
maintaining compatibility.
dependencies.name: pkgconfig

dependencies.description: zlib replacement with optimizations for next generation systems.
dependencies.name: zlib-api

dependent_to.description: A cat(1) clone with wings.
dependent_to.name: bat

dependent_to.description: A project for generating C bindings from Rust code.
dependent_to.name: cbindgen

dependent_to.description: du + rust = dust. Like du but more intuitive.
dependent_to.name: dust

dependent_to.description:
DEPRECATED: The exa upstream is no longer maintained, see the eza
package for a replacement. exa is a replacement for ls written in Rust.
dependent_to.name: exa

dependent_to.description: A modern, maintained replacement for ls.
dependent_to.name: eza

dependent_to.description: A simple, fast and user-friendly alternative to 'find'
dependent_to.name: fd

dependent_to.description:
Foldseek enables fast and sensitive comparisons of large protein
structure sets
dependent_to.name: foldseek

dependent_to.description:
fq is a library to generate and validate FASTQ file pairs. fq provides
subcommands for filtering, generating, subsampling, and validating FASTQ
files.
dependent_to.name: fq

dependent_to.description:
A chr/pos/feature GTF sorter that uses a lexicographically-based index
ordering algorithm
dependent_to.name: gtfsort

dependent_to.description: A command-line benchmarking tool.
dependent_to.name: hyperfine

dependent_to.description: Scheduler for sub-node tasks for HPC systems with batch scheduling
dependent_to.name: hyperqueue

dependent_to.description: Kakoune Language Server Protocol Client
dependent_to.name: kakoune-lsp

dependent_to.description:
Legion is a data-centric parallel programming system for writing
portable high performance programs targeted at distributed heterogeneous
architectures. Legion presents abstractions which allow programmers to
describe properties of program data (e.g. independence, locality). By
making the Legion programming system aware of the structure of program
data, it can automate many of the tedious tasks programmers currently
face, including correctly extracting task- and data-level parallelism
and moving data around complex memory hierarchies. A novel mapping
interface provides explicit programmer controlled placement of data in
the memory hierarchy and assignment of tasks to processors in a way that
is orthogonal to correctness, thereby enabling easy porting and tuning
of Legion applications to new architectures.
dependent_to.name: legion

dependent_to.description: Library to render SVG files using Cairo
dependent_to.name: librsvg

dependent_to.description:
A rewrite of GNU ls with lots of added features like colors, icons,
tree-view, more formatting options etc.
dependent_to.name: lsd

dependent_to.description:
MLC LLM is a machine learning compiler and high-performance deployment
engine for large language models. The mission of this project is to
enable everyone to develop, optimize, and deploy AI models natively on
everyone's platforms.
dependent_to.name: mlc-llm

dependent_to.description: An interactive cheatsheet tool for the command-line
dependent_to.name: navi

dependent_to.description: Another cmake lsp
dependent_to.name: neocmakelsp

dependent_to.description:
Polypolish is a tool for polishing genome assemblies with short reads.
Unlike other tools in this category, Polypolish uses SAM files where
each read has been aligned to all possible locations (not just a single
best location). This allows it to repair errors in repeat regions that
other alignment-based polishers cannot fix.
dependent_to.name: polypolish

dependent_to.description:
cryptography is a package which provides cryptographic recipes and
primitives to Python developers
dependent_to.name: py-cryptography

dependent_to.description: Fast iterable JSON parser.
dependent_to.name: py-jiter

dependent_to.description: Low level implementations for computer vision in Rust.
dependent_to.name: py-kornia-rs

dependent_to.description:
Build and publish crates with pyo3, rust-cpython and cffi bindings as
well as rust binaries as python packages.
dependent_to.name: py-maturin

dependent_to.description:
Fast, correct Python JSON library supporting dataclasses, datetimes, and
numpy.
dependent_to.name: py-orjson

dependent_to.description: Blazingly fast DataFrame library.
dependent_to.name: py-polars

dependent_to.description: A Sampling Profiler for Python.
dependent_to.name: py-py-spy

dependent_to.description: Core functionality for Pydantic validation and serialization
dependent_to.name: py-pydantic-core

dependent_to.description: Python bindings to the Rust rpds crate for persistent data structures.
dependent_to.name: py-rpds-py

dependent_to.description: A better TOML library for python implemented in rust.
dependent_to.name: py-rtoml

dependent_to.description: An extremely fast Python linter, written in Rust.
dependent_to.name: py-ruff

dependent_to.description: Setuptools rust extension plugin.
dependent_to.name: py-setuptools-rust

dependent_to.description: Fast data loading for TensorBoard
dependent_to.name: py-tensorboard-data-server

dependent_to.description: Fast and Customizable Tokenizers.
dependent_to.name: py-tokenizers

dependent_to.description:
ripgrep is a line-oriented search tool that recursively searches your
current directory for a regex pattern. ripgrep is similar to other
popular search tools like The Silver Searcher, ack and grep.
dependent_to.name: ripgrep

dependent_to.description: An RPKI Validator and RTR server written in Rust
dependent_to.name: routinator

dependent_to.description: The rust programming language toolchain
dependent_to.name: rust-bindgen

dependent_to.description: A full featured, fast Command Line Argument Parser for Rust
dependent_to.name: rust-clap

dependent_to.description:
Sourmash: Quickly search, compare, and analyze genomic and metagenomic
data sets with k-mer sketches.
dependent_to.name: sourmash

dependent_to.description: Feature-rich console based todo list manager
dependent_to.name: task

dependent_to.description:
zoxide is a smarter cd command, inspired by z and autojump. It remembers
which directories you use most frequently, so you can "jump" to them in
just a few keystrokes. zoxide works on all major shells.
dependent_to.name: zoxide

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
